SamPy.astronomy.conversions.redshiftFromScale¶

SamPy.astronomy.conversions.redshiftFromScale(scale)¶

Converts a scale factor to redshift.

Parameters:
  • scale (float or ndarray) – scale factor
Returns:

redshift
Return type:

float or ndarray
